themes.description: This theme covers feedback related to specific trading functionalities, order types, and feature availability or design within the trading platform.
This theme captures reviews expressing satisfaction, appreciation, or positive experiences with the application's features, usability, or overall service.
This theme covers user suggestions for new features, enhancements, or additions to the application's functionality.
This theme covers complaints related to the design, user-friendliness, and overall usability of the application's interface and features.
This theme covers concerns related to the safety of invested funds, perceived loss of money, or warnings about the inherent risks associated with investments on the platform.
This theme covers complaints about unfair pricing, manipulated rates, and deceptive trading practices that lead to financial losses.
This theme captures overall positive or negative sentiment about the application's general usability, design, or user satisfaction without focusing on specific issues or feature requests.
This theme covers requests for new features, missing functionalities, or enhancements to existing features within the application.

This theme addresses feedback where users report the absence of specific functionalities, categories, or options they expect to find within the platform. It covers requests for new additions or the reintroduction of previously available features.
This theme covers requests for new functionalities, product enhancements, or integrations with other services.
General positive or negative comments about the app that do not relate to specific features or issues.
General positive or negative feedback about the overall user experience, market observations, or personal trading outcomes not tied to specific app features.
This theme covers issues related to how investments, portfolios, and holdings are managed, displayed, or processed within the platform, including incorrect allocations or calculations.
This theme covers feedback and issues related to the visual design, layout, navigation, and overall user experience of the application's interface.
This theme covers issues related to the accuracy, speed, and reliability of trade execution, including slippage, order fulfillment discrepancies, and pricing accuracy during live trading.
Issues related to account creation, deletion, modification, or verification processes.
Suggestions for new features or enhancements to existing functionalities within the app.
Questions or feedback related to available investment products, types, and how to access them on the platform.
General feedback, positive or negative, regarding the app's usability, design, intuitiveness, and overall user satisfaction.
Feedback or complaints related to the actual returns, losses, or overall performance of investments made through the platform.
Requests for new features, enhancements to existing functionalities, or suggestions for product improvements.
General positive or negative feedback about the overall application usability, design, and user experience.
Concerns or questions related to accessing specific programs, beta initiatives, or account-related features.
